item.title: Semantic URLs
item.description: When building a web application, designers and developers have many choices. The URL structure of a web application seems to be an often overlooked and underappreciated detail. In my view, if an application adopts semantic URLs, it enables some user behaviors which lead to product value and increased/extended adoption. But what exactly is a Semantic URL?
